short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best event tickets, every single time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spotlight is the Expedia for sports & concert tickets. As a chrome extension, Spotlight is your all-in-one digital copilot for navigating this online marketplace.

Compare seats & prices, save money, and earn rewards as you plan for your next big concert!

🤨🙄🧐 Why Spotlight?

🤡 10 tabs, 10-minute countdowns
We used to open multiple tabs across our favorite ticket platforms, each with a countdown timer, just to compare ticket seats & prices. When we finally made up my mind, the timer expired and our hold on the ticket was lost.

🥷 Hidden service fees
Tired of entering your email, address, credit card information, all before you even get to see the final price? What about the super random service fees that cost HALF the price of the ticket?

😩 Mental headspace
Wait… what if you didn’t try hard enough? Was there a better ticket for that Coachella concert you didn’t find because you gave up too early?

🚀🚀🚀 Let Spotlight do the heavy lifting

🎸 Just another ticket platform?
Spotlight doesn’t actually sell tickets. We only show you tickets across your favorite ticket platforms.

💃 The best seats, the best prices
Too many options? We only show you tickets that are both CHEAPER and has a BETTER SEAT. You only GAIN by switching.

🧘‍♀️ Install and forget
Free up your mental headspace. Spotlight is invisible… until we save you real $$ on your next purchase.

🔥❤️😊 Most loved features

🌎 unbeatable tickets from the entire internet
👀 compare everything, all in 1 place
💰 save money, every single time
👩‍🎨 personalize your experience, filter out platforms you don’t like
